name: Rolly - 3D Ball Game
description:
Movement - WASD,  Go to Menu - ESC,  Reset Level - R

A simple 3D game with 4 modes.

Singleplayer - 2 Levels with movable objects and enemies that push you

Arena - Enemies spawn and try to push you off and as time progresses it gets harder

Multiplayer Arena - Enemies spawn and try to push you off and as time progresses it gets harder (but with 2 people)

Multiplayer - Use WASD and Arrow Keys to battle your friends
